Title: Tellurian begins construction on Driftwood LNG project
Description: US LNG project developer Tellurian has begun construction on its 27.6 mtpa Driftwood LNG export project near Lake Charles in Louisiana, having issued Benchtel Energy with a limited notice to proceed with the work under its engineering, procurement and construction contract.
Author: CK

Title: Singapore’s SLNG secures a second FSRU to enhance the country’s energy security
Description: Singapore terminal operator Singapore LNG (SLNG) has secured a second floating storage unit (FSU) unit to bolster the country’s LNG storage capabilities as it seeks to enhance the country’s energy security, according to industry participants.
Author: CK

Title: Sakhalin Energy to offer one LNG cargo loading in early May from Sakhalin LNG
Description: Sakhalin Energy is expected to offer one LNG cargo loading on May 7 at the 10.9 mtpa Sakhalin LNG plant at Russia’s Prigorodnoye plant through a tender to be issued by or on Mar. 30, according to term offtakers.
Author: CK

Title: Vitol, PetroChina submit lowest offers for April-May cargoes in Pakistan LNG tender
Description: Global energy trader Vitol and China’s state-owned PetroChina have submitted the lowest offers in state-owned Pakistan LNG’s (PLL) recently closed tender to buy a total of two cargoes for delivery in April and May to its Pakistan GasPort LNG receiving terminal in Port Qasim.
Author: CK
